entry.title: Monin - Chai Tea Concentrate Syrup - 750 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 9.99

Quickly and easily make popular chai drinks with this Monin chai tea 7:1 concentrate!

Featuring notes of clove, cinnamon, and ginger, this aromatic concentrate offers the perfect way to create delicious, well balanced chai tea beverages in your diner, bakery, hotel, or office. Packaged in a glass bottle, this concentrate boasts a sleek appearance for an attractive shelf presence and can easily be paired with a compatible pump for quick, efficient service during peak serving hours.

Easy to Prepare

To make a hot chai tea, simply add 1.5 oz. concentrate to a cup and stir in steamed milk. For an iced chai, simply fill a glass with ice, mix 0.5 oz. concentrate with water, stir, and serve. It is conveniently pre-sweetened with pure cane sugar, making it an easy one step solution to serving quality chai tea in your establishment. Each bottle makes approximately (25) 8 oz. drinks.

This delicious spiced punch is perfect for serving at your winter and fall events!

Monin - Chai Tea (Masala Chai) Concentrate Syrup - 750 ml

entry.title: Monin - Margarita Mix Syrup - 64 Oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 31.99

Bring exotic citrus flavor to your beverages with this Monin premium Margarita flavoring syrup!

This syrup provides a quick and easy way to add exciting new flavor and a vibrant color to a variety of your handcrafted cocktails, sodas, iced teas, and lemonades. Made with pure cane sugar and no artificial ingredients, this all natural syrup will enhance the flavor profile of your mixed or blended drinks without overpowering them or being too sweet. You can even use this syrup to create deliciously sweet popsicles, sorbets, or glazes for entrees! Packaged in a shatterproof plastic bottle, this flavoring syrup is an excellent addition to any restaurant, bar, coffee shop, or cafe. It boasts a sleek appearance for an attractive shelf presence and can easily be paired with a compatible pump for quick, efficient service during peak serving hours.

Dietary Details:

Allergen Free, Dairy Free, Gluten Free, Halal, Kosher, No Artificial Colours, No Artificial Flavours, No Artificial Ingredients, No Artificial Preservatives, No Artificial Sweeteners, Non GMO, Vegan, Clean Label

Monin - Margarita Mix Syrup - 64 Oz
